item.title: [SRL]{RS2]Shock's Hybrid Power Miner And Power Chopper
item.dc:creator: @shock -shock-
item.description:
@shock wrote:

[CENTER][font=Verdana]Shock’s hybrid power miner and chopper[/font][/CENTER]

i have now completed my script (my 2rd one to be exact) and i am now releseing it. you may remember me from a long time ago when i released my second script (shock’s bow flecher and stringer)… anyway here is some info:

[CENTER]fetures:[/CENTER]
mines a full invintory of ores then drops or
chops a full invintory of logs then drops.
anti randoms
anti ban
progress report

[CENTER]credits:[/CENTER]
to all of the creators of SRL! i could not
have made my script without SRL!
me - for coding it
[CENTER]fetures in next version:[/CENTER]
autocolor
axe head finding

{~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~power~skills~script~by~shock~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~SSSSSSS~~~H~~~~~~~H~~~OOOOOO~~~~CCCCCC~~~K~~~~~~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~S~~~~~~~S~~H~~~~~~~H~~O~~~~~~O~~C~~~~~~C~~K~~~~~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~S~~~~~~~~~~H~~~~~~~H~~O~~~~~~O~~C~~~~~~~~~K~~~~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~SSSSSSS~~~HHHHHHHHH~~O~~~~~~O~~C~~~~~~~~~K~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~S~~H~~~~~~~H~~O~~~~~~O~~C~~~~~~~~~K~~~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~S~~H~~~~~~~H~~O~~~~~~O~~C~~~~~~C~~K~~~~~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~SSSSSSS~~~H~~~~~~~H~~~OOOOOO~~~~CCCCCC~~~K~~~~~~~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ SETUP ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ 1. set-up players and constants ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ 2. make shure that you have an axe/ ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ pic axe EQUIPED ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ 3. click play! ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ credits ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ to all of the creators of SRL! i could not ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ have made my script without SRL! ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ me - for coding it :p ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ fetures: ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ power mining ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ power choping ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ anti-ban/anti-randoms ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ fetures in the next version: ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ axe head finding ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ more anti-randoms ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~ banking(if i get the time) ~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~} {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

please post progress reports and feedback andd/or problems
ENGOY! :eek:

also feel free to use any procedres in this script as long as you give me a little credit.
